Package de.intarsys.security.smartcard.pcsc

This is the high level PC/SC wrapper.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    INativePCSCLib
    The abstraction of an external library implementing the PC/SC API.
    IPCSCCardReader
    The iconified PC/SC card reader terminal.
    IPCSCConnection
    The iconified PC/SC connection.
    IPCSCContext
    The iconified PC/SC context.
    IPCSCContextFactory
    A factory for an IPCSCContext.
    PCSCStatusMonitor.IStatusListener

    Class Description

    PCSCCardReaderState
    The PC/SC model level card reader state.

    The default IPCSCConnection implementation.
    PCSCContext
    The default IPCSCContext implementation.
    PCSCContextFactory
    A singleton access for the IPCSCContextFactory on this system.
    PCSCMultiContext

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    PCSCException
    An exceptional condition in the PC/SC handling
    PCSCReset
    Signal a PCSC level card reset.

Package de.intarsys.security.smartcard.pcsc Description

This is the high level PC/SC wrapper. Based on intarsys native-c all relevant functions and structures for accessing PC/SC on Windows and pcsc-lite based platforms are provided.
